news_header: PulteGroup, Inc. reported a profit increase in Q4, beating estimates with earnings of $913.24 million.
news_original_title: PulteGroup, Inc. Reveals Rise In Q4 Profit, Beats Estimates
news_text: PulteGroup, Inc. (PHM) reported a profit of $913.24 million, or $4.43 per share, for its fourth quarter, an increase from $710.99 million, or $3.28 per share, last year. The company's revenue rose 14.6% to $4.921 billion from $4.293 billion last year, surpassing analysts' expectations of $3.27 per share.
